name: Vegan Black Pepper Mac and Cheese with Potato Carrot Cheese Sauce
description: Vegan Black Pepper Mac and Cheese with a light potato carrot cheese sauce. Free of dairy, egg, corn, nuts. Can be made soy-free and gluten-free with gf pasta. 30 minute meal. Add cashews to make a thicker creamier sauce. Recipe inspired by several veggie cheese sauce recipes.

recipeIngredient: 1  medium potato (about 1 cup or use 3/4 cup mashed potatoes)
2 tbsp chopped onion  (or use 1/2 tsp onion powder)
2 tbsp extra virgin olive oil (omit to make oil free)
3/4 to 1 tsp freshly ground black pepper (divided)
6 to 8 oz elbows pasta (cooked to preference)

recipeInstructions.text: In a skillet, add water, potato, carrots, garlic, onion, chili and tomato. Cover and cook over medium-high heat for 17 to 19 minutes or until the potato is very tender and breaks easily. (add 2 Tbsp cashews for creamier sauce). Cool slightly.
